rainfalls:
Rainfall Advisory No. 1 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 12:00 PM, 02 July 2025(Wednesday)



Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains are expected over Tarlac and Nueva Ecija.



Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Bataan, Zambales(San Narciso, San Antonio, San Marcelino, Castillejos, Subic, Olongapo), Bulacan(Calumpit, Hagonoy) and Pampanga(Masantol, Macabebe, Sasmuan, Lubao, Floridablanca, Porac, San Fernando, Bacolor, Santa Rita, Guagua, Minalin) and may affect nearby areas.



The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 2:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 2 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 10:55 AM, 02 July 2025(Wednesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Cavite and Quezon within the next 2 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Bataan(Bagac, Morong, Hermosa, Dinalupihan, Orani, Samal, Abucay, Balanga), Zambales(San Marcelino, Castillejos, Subic, Olongapo, San Antonio, San Narciso, San Felipe) and Pampanga(Porac, Angeles, Floridablanca) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
